biography_text: SHERMAN, Brad, a Representative from California; born in Los Angeles, Los Angeles County, Calif., October 24, 1954; B.A., University of California, Los Angeles, Calif., 1974; J.D., Harvard University, Cambridge, Mass., 1979; lawyer, private practice; certified public accountant; member of the California state board of equalization, 1990-1995; chair, California state board of equalization, 1991-1995; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Fifth and to the ten succeeding Congresses (January 3, 1997-present).
place_of_birth: Los Angeles, Los Angeles County, Calif.

post_secondary_degrees.institution: University of California, Los Angeles, Calif.
